igloo_reader_pro.name: Igloo Reader Pro
igloo_reader_pro.shortDescription: The Igloo Reader Pro is a compact, state-of-the-art all-in-one analyzer for Point-of-Care Testing (POCT). It combines laboratory accuracy with the requirements of decentralized environments. Supports Lateral Flow, Microarray, Fluorescence, and more – the ideal solution for fast, reliable quantitative and qualitative test results.
detailedDescription: The Igloo Reader Pro redefines mobile diagnostics. Designed specifically for professional environments and decentralized Point-of-Care applications, this versatile analyzer enables fast and reliable qualitative and quantitative testing.

The reader supports a wide range of diagnostic tests – from infectious disease screening to cardiac markers and hormone profiles, to drug abuse and allergy panels. Thanks to automated calibration, cloud integration, and digital data export, the Igloo Reader Pro delivers laboratory quality directly to where it is needed. It allows medical professionals to achieve fast and reliable results anywhere.
features: Universal Test Platform: Supports Microarray, Lateral Flow, Colorimetry, Fluorescence, Dry Chemistry, and Microfluidics.
Lab Accuracy in POCT Format: High precision through automatic self-calibration before each measurement (CV < 2 % Inter-Reader, CV < 3 % Intra-Reader).
Compact & Mobile: Lightweight design with a battery life of up to 24 hours of continuous testing.
Full Connectivity: Integrated Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and USB-C for seamless data synchronization and API/LIMS integration.
Secure Cloud Integration (Dx365 Cloud): For test updates, calibration management, and encrypted data storage.
Versatile Sample Types: Compatible with whole blood, capillary blood, serum, plasma, urine, stool, saliva, and hair.
